div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 193 Thebes, Boeotia, 1935 (1103) Burial: c. 225-200 B.C. Contents: 39 AR Alexander III: 8 early post dr. (Asia Minor mints) Lysimachus: 1 dr. (Colophon) Athens: 7 tetradr. (late 3rd cent.); 1 pentob.; 3 dr. Rhodes: 14 didr. Ptolemy II: 5 tetradr. (as Svoronos 365, 626, 644, 713, ?) Disposition: unknown Hackens, BCH 1969, pp. 702-11
